title: General
stimulusHtml:
2 points maximum

Identification (1 point) and Connection (1 point)

Identification:

C 6 H 12 O 6 +6 O 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4031@ --> 6CO 2  + 6H 2 O MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4001@

sugar + oxygen --> carbon dioxide + water

Connection:
CO 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@38BB@ released by cellular respiration
